dublin_core.dcvalue: Teleradiology is yet to take off in India This is unfortunate since this technology is ideal for a country like India where expertise in remote areas for advanced investigations such as CT and MR is lacking We were the first center in India to use teleradiology on a regular basis Our initial methodology in 1996 was using video capture cards and Windows 95 dial up protocols Now we use DICOM transfers and remote access software Even today 4 years later we are the only center in India using teleradiology on a regular basis
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-12T12:10:07Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2001-04-20
Current status and history of teleradiology in India.
